name: Travis CI Test
body:
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/takahiroharada/TravisCITest.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/takahiroharada/TravisCITest)

OpenCL execution test using Travis CI. 

It is 
- setting up OpenCL
- creating makefile using premake
- run unit tests

```
sudo apt-get update -qq

sudo apt-get install -qq fglrx=2:8.960-0ubuntu1 fglrx-amdcccle

sudo apt-get install -qq opencl-headers
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
